cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Financial Services on May 12, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 166, Fair Lending for All Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 2 (Monday, January 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GREEN of Texas:
H.R. 166.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Commerce Clause (Art. 1, Sec. 8, Cl. 3)
Necessary and Proper Clause (Art. 1, Sec. 8, Cl. 18)
[Page H55]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 263.

title: Fair Lending for All Act
